explanation: The 3×3×2×2 NS polytope has a vertex with Bell value 9.0
This optimal box has deterministic correlations with uniform marginals
P(a=b|x,y)=1 for all (x,y) except (1,1) where P(a≠b|1,1)=1
All marginals are uniform [0.5, 0.5], satisfying NS constraints exactly
The PR-lift (4.0) is a valid but suboptimal NS box
Our search found boxes with values up to 8.40, which are genuine but suboptimal
refined_understanding.key_insight: Shared-randomness boxes can achieve much higher Bell values than PR-lifts in extended scenarios
